pages.title: Phase 0-1
pages.text: $(bold)Phase 0: Normal$() (Days 0-5)$(br)No effects. Sun is normal. Use this time to prepare.$(br2)$(bold)Phase 1: Twilight$() (Days 5-12)$(br)Sun visibly shrinks. Rain becomes frequent. Slight temperature drop. Last chance to see the sun clearly.

pages.title: Phase 2-3
pages.text: $(bold)Phase 2: Cooling$() (Days 12-22)$(br)Temp: -10°C. Permanent rain/snow. Water freezes. Vegetation dies.$(br2)$(bold)Phase 3: The Long Night$() (Days 22-34)$(br)Temp: -25°C. Permanent storms. Lava begins to cool. Fog rolls in. Surface becomes dangerous.

pages.title: Phase 4-5
pages.text: $(bold)Phase 4: Deep Freeze$() (Days 34-46)$(br)Temp: -45°C. Obsidian freezes. Coal ore crystallizes. Dense fog, near darkness. Surface is lethal.$(br2)$(bold)Phase 5: Eternal Winter$() (Days 46-60)$(br)Temp: -70°C to -120°C. Permanent midnight. Blizzard whiteout. Only deep underground is survivable.

pages.title: Phase 6
pages.text: $(bold)Phase 6: Atmospheric Collapse$() (Days 60-100)$(br)Temp: -120°C to -273°C$(br2)$(italic)Early:$() Extreme blizzard.$(br)$(italic)Mid:$() Atmosphere thins, wind dies, fog lifts.$(br)$(italic)Late:$() Vacuum. Stars visible. No sound on surface. Ice sublimates. Suffocation without shelter.
